account_code_box_empty.description: Accounting code neets to be at least one character for the box to accept an entry. shown as toast/snackbar to user (temporary on screen message)
account_code_box_empty.message: Please provide an accounting code to print

config_cache_deleted.description: Notify the user the printer config cache has been deleted

credit_copy.description: The remaining print page limits in page values

credit_print.description: The remaining print page limits in page values

credit_value.description: Amount of credit remaining to print with (in currency)

dpio_edge_node_sign_in.description: Link to show a popup to sign in as an Edge Node
dpio_edge_node_sign_in.message: Sign in as dpio Edge Node

edge_node_select_title.description: title when prompting the user to select an Edge Node

edge_print_auth_cleared.description: Notify the user the printer Edge Print authorization has been cleared

environment_quickcode.description: State that the allocation was via an OS. Environment Variable settting QuickCodes

error_with_status_code.description: Show an error with a given status code

follow_me_app_key.description: Settings header to show the user the follow me application

follow_me_app_value.description: Button text for the user selecting to show the release app install

ink_save_2_up.description: Whether to print 2 pages side by side to every one sheet of paper (checkbox)

ink_save_best.description: The best quality ink save profile (no ink saving)

ink_save_dont_print_blank.description: Whether to skip over printing blank pages during the print (checkbox)

ink_save_dont_print_nblank.description: Whether to skip over printing nearly blank pages during the print (checkbox)

ink_save_estimated_saving.description: The amount of ink that can be saved by using the current ink save profile instead of "Best"
ink_save_estimated_saving.message: Estimated page ink usage vs "Best" Quality

ink_save_printing_xofx.description: Notify the number of pages against total pages to be printed

ink_save_saving.description: A percentage of the amount of ink being saved

ink_save_tooltip_best.description: tooltip popup for "best" ink saving option

ink_save_tooltip_draft.description: tooltip popup for "draft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_draft.message: Removes all color, reduces black intensity to save ink/toner

ink_save_tooltip_mono.description: tooltip popup for "mono" ink saving option

ink_save_tooltip_saver.description: tooltip popup for "saver" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_saver.message: Uses less toner/ink while maintaining images & text

ink_save_tooltip_superdraft.description: tooltip popup for "superdraft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_superdraft.message: Removes all color, reduces black intensity even more

ink_save_tooltip_ultradraft.description: tooltip popup for "ultradraft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_ultradraft.message: Removes all color, removes most images

ink_save_tooltip_zap.description: tooltip popup for "image zap" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_zap.message: Locates and reduces image ink, text is unchanged for readability (proofing)

ink_save_ultradraft.description: (very very draft) Ultradraft ink usage profile

job_account_code_entry_choose.description: Placeholder text for the dropdown seleciton box to pick an accounting code

job_account_code_entry_fill.description: Placeholder text for the freeform entry box to enter an accounting code

job_account_code_entry_text.description: to follow on with job_account_code_entry_title, jobname on printername

job_account_code_entry_title.description: Title for modal popup requiring the user to input an accounting code

job_make_default_check.description: Text for checkbox to make the current code default for the next time

job_multiple_copies.description: Number of copies of the current job to print (multiple)

job_no_jobs.description: The placeholder text for when there are no current print jobs

job_popup_cancel.description: Notification to user as they are cancelling a print job
job_popup_cancel.message: Are you sure you want to cancel this job?

job_single_copy.description: Number of copies of the current job to print (singular)

job_state_acc_code_select.description: Current job state - the job is awaiting the user to select and accounting code

job_state_back_off.description: Current job state - the job is awaiting retry on a printer

job_state_claimed.description: Current job state - the job has been claimed by another print node

job_state_complete.description: Current job state - the job has been completed

job_state_converted.description: Current job state - the job has been converted

job_state_converting.description: Current job state - the job is converting

job_state_created.description: Current job state - the job has been created

job_state_download_failed.description: Current job state - the job download has failed and it's awaiting to retry

job_state_downloading.description: Current job state - the job is downloading from the cloud

job_state_error.description: Current job state - the job has errored and will not continue

job_state_follow_me_prompt.description: Current job state - the job is awaitng the user to confirm the follow-me prompt

job_state_invalid.description: Current job state - the job is in an unknown/invalid state

job_state_pin_required.description: Current job state - the job is awaiting PIN release

job_state_printer_stalled.description: Current job state - the job has been stalled due to a printer issue

job_state_printing.description: The job is currently printing on the printer $PRINTER_NAME$

job_state_queued.description: Current job state - the job is queued waiting for printer availability

job_state_started.description: Current job state - the job has been started

job_state_uploading.description: Current job state - the job is uploading to the cloud

job_state_user_cancelled.description: Current job state - the job has been cancelled by the user

job_state_user_input.description: Current job state - the job is waiting for user input

job_state_validating_acc.description: Current job state - the job is validating the given accounting code

nav_add.description: Clickable button for adding an option

nav_cancel.description: Clickable button to cancel a prompt

nav_enter.description: Clickable button to enter some input

nav_go.description: Clickable button to go forward with a submission

nav_ok.description: Clickable button to ok a prompt

nav_print.description: Clickable button to continue to print

nav_printers.description: shorthand for 'Active Printer List', link to page

nav_queue.description: shorthand for 'Print Queue', link to page

nav_remove.description: Clickable button for removing an option

nav_yes.description: Clickable button for yes on a notification

no_admin_user_data.description: Notify the user that no data has been set by the admin for them

no_advanced_options.description: Notification to the user that there are no advanced options available for the given printer

no_id.description: Stating that there is no ID found

not_available.description: statement that the given settings value is currently not available

printer_advanced.description: Clickable text to go to printer advanced options from menu drop down

printer_bridge_proxy.description: Printer is connected via a networked bridge at the given IP $ADDRESS$

printer_bridge_title.description: Is the printer connected directly or via a networked bridge e.g. proxy

printer_capability_cached.description: Capabilitiesof the printer cached on the given localized $DATE$

printer_capability_title.description: State of printer capabilities - cached or fetched on print

printer_enter_quickcode.description: Label for the QuickCode text entry box

printer_enter_quickcode_modal.description: Modal title for the enter a QuickCode modal

printer_format_detect_fail.description: Note that the detection of printer formats failed

printer_format_title.description: List of formats the printer supports

printer_icon_edge.description: The printer is a network printer that can be printed to via cloud infrastructure

printer_icon_local.description: The printer is local and can be printed to immediately

printer_icon_queue.description: The printer is a network queue that can be printed to via cloud infrastructure

printer_icon_secure.description: The printer requires a PIN to release print jobs

printer_icon_unavailable.description: The printer is not available for use

printer_multiple_printers_allocated.description: Notification to user that the client has allocated $COUNT$ (2 or more) printers to the user

printer_no_printers.description: Message on screen that highlights to the user that they have no printers

printer_no_usb_nwjs.description: Notification to user that the app needs USB permssions to talk to a printer

printer_one_printers_allocated.description: Notification to user that the client has allocated 1 printer to the user

printer_popup_delete.description: Notification to user as they are removing a printer
printer_popup_delete.message: Are you sure you want to remove this printer?

printer_status_accepting.description: Printer is able to accept new print jobs

printer_status_not_accepting.description: Printer is not able to accept new print jobs

printer_status_not_queried.description: Status of printer for non contactable printers

printer_status_title.description: Current identified status of the printer

printer_status_unknown.description: Printer is not contactable and status is unknown, we will still attempt to print

printer_test_cannot_resolve.description: Connection status result when the printer is not contactable at all
printer_test_cannot_resolve.message: The driver cannot contact the printer, all tests have failed. Please check the printer is turned on and that TCP traffic is not blocked.

printer_tests.description: Clickable text to go to printer information from menu drop down

printer_tests_bridge.description: Printer connnected via network bridge, no protocol tests available

printer_tests_ipp_available.description: Printer can connect via IPP protocol

printer_tests_ipp_connect_fail.description: Notify the user that the printer cannot connect via $TEST$ due to the reason listed against $TEST_STATUS%
printer_tests_ipp_connect_fail.message: Cannot connect via $TEST$, see error against $TEST_STATUS$ below

printer_tests_ipps_available.description: Printer can connect via IPPS protocol

printer_tests_port_closed.description: Connection status result when the printer can't connect on the given port

printer_tests_port_connecting.description: Connection status result during test run

printer_tests_port_not_available.description: Connection status result for network test stack not being available

printer_tests_port_title.description: Status of connecting to the printer on port $NUMBER$

printer_tests_title.description: Tests to run against the printer

printer_tests_usb.description: Printer connnected via USB protocol, other protocols not applicable

printer_usb_permission.description: Notification to user that the app needs USB permssions to talk to a printer

settings_acc_code.description: The default accounting code to use for a print job

settings_admin_user_config.description: Any adming specific configruation forced onto the user

settings_chrome_ver.description: Version of Chrome the app is running on

settings_clear_cache.description: Button to clear the cached capabilities of the printers

settings_device_id.description: The ID of the given device

settings_dpio_service.description: The directprint.io server status and version

settings_dpio_service_unavailable.description: An issue with contacting the server followed by the specific $status$

settings_edge.description: settings heading name for part of our product 'Edge Print'

settings_edge_node_name.description: heading name for the name of the logged in edge node

settings_log.description: The debug log of the application

settings_os.description: Operating system of the device the app is running on

settings_ou_group.description: The Organizational unit / group the user belongs to

settings_pin.description: The pin number used to secure jobs for printers that require a pin

settings_printers_allocated.description: How the printers were allocated to the application

settings_unlink_user.description: Button to sign the user out and unlink their account

settings_userid.description: The user ID of the logged in user

sign_in.description: Label on button to show sign in options to the user

sign_in_dpio_edge_placeholder.description: placeholder for a token paste text entry field

sign_in_dpio_edge_title.description: Title to show a sign in option to the user
sign_in_dpio_edge_title.message: Sign in using the token acquired from the dpio cloud Edge Print dashboard

sign_in_longform.description: Title to show sign in options to the user
sign_in_longform.message: Sign in with Google or Microsoft to access your allocated printers

sign_in_or.description: Suggesting an alternate method of moving forwards, this *OR* that

signon_reminder_dismiss.description: button text to not show this notificaiton again

signon_reminder_message.description: Prompt the user that they could have printers if they sign in or use a quickcode
signon_reminder_message.message: Sign in or use quickcodes to use directprint.io

signon_reminder_show.description: button text for the app to open to sign in or use a quickcode

signon_reminder_title.description: Notification prompt to the user to sign in to the app

title_configuration.description: Page title for the configuration(settings) page

title_ink_save.description: Page title for page dedicated to encourage users to save ink when printing

title_printer_info.description: Page title for information on a specific printer

title_printer_options.description: Page title for advanced options of a specific printer (page size etc.)

title_printerlist.description: Page title for a list of printers available to the user

title_printqueue.description: Page title for a list of print jobs that are printing or queued to be printed

unknown.description: statement that the given settings value is currently unknown

update_available_ui.description: message for bar in the ui to click to update the application

update_message.description: prompting the user that there is an update available

update_now.description: button text for the app to update now

update_remind.description: button text for the app to remind again tomorrow

update_title.description: prompting the user that there is an update available
